content:
TITLE: Setting API Keys in .env.local
DESCRIPTION: Example of setting API keys in the .env.local file for various LLM providers.
SOURCE: https://github.com/stackblitz-labs/bolt.diy/blob/main/docs/docs/index.md#2025-04-20_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: plaintext
CODE:
```
GROQ_API_KEY=XXX
OPENAI_API_KEY=XXX
ANTHROPIC_API_KEY=XXX
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Environment Variables Configuration Example
DESCRIPTION: Example of environment variables needed for the bolt.diy project, including API keys for various services and optional configuration settings.
SOURCE: https://github.com/stackblitz-labs/bolt.diy/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-20_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
GROQ_API_KEY=XXX
HuggingFace_API_KEY=XXX
OPENAI_API_KEY=XXX
...
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Environment Variable Configuration
DESCRIPTION: Example of environment variable configuration for API keys and debug settings.
SOURCE: https://github.com/stackblitz-labs/bolt.diy/blob/main/docs/docs/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-20_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
GROQ_API_KEY=XXX
HuggingFace_API_KEY=XXX
OPENAI_API_KEY=XXX
...
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Optional Environment Variable Settings
DESCRIPTION: Optional environment variables that can be configured, including debug level and context size settings.
SOURCE: https://github.com/stackblitz-labs/bolt.diy/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-20_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
VITE_LOG_LEVEL=debug
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Initial Repository Setup Commands
DESCRIPTION: Commands for cloning the repository and installing project dependencies using pnpm.
SOURCE: https://github.com/stackblitz-labs/bolt.diy/blob/main/docs/docs/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-20_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
git clone https://github.com/stackblitz-labs/bolt.diy.git
pnpm install
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Cloning bolt.diy Repository
DESCRIPTION: Git command to clone the stable branch of the bolt.diy repository.
SOURCE: https://github.com/stackblitz-labs/bolt.diy/blob/main/docs/docs/index.md#2025-04-20_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
git clone -b stable https://github.com/stackblitz-labs/bolt.diy
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Cloning the Repository for bolt.diy Development
DESCRIPTION: Command to clone the bolt.diy repository from GitHub to the local development environment.
SOURCE: https://github.com/stackblitz-labs/bolt.diy/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-20_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
git clone https://github.com/stackblitz-labs/bolt.diy.git
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing Dependencies with PNPM
DESCRIPTION: Command to install all project dependencies using the PNPM package manager.
SOURCE: https://github.com/stackblitz-labs/bolt.diy/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-20_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
pnpm install
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing Project Dependencies
DESCRIPTION: Commands to install project dependencies using pnpm, including a global installation of pnpm if needed.
SOURCE: https://github.com/stackblitz-labs/bolt.diy/blob/main/docs/docs/index.md#2025-04-20_snippet_4

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
pnpm install
```

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
sudo npm install -g pnpm
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Setting Context Size Environment Variable
DESCRIPTION: Example of setting the DEFAULT_NUM_CTX environment variable which affects VRAM usage.
SOURCE: https://github.com/stackblitz-labs/bolt.diy/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-20_snippet_4

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
DEFAULT_NUM_CTX=32768
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Environment Variable Context Configuration
DESCRIPTION: Example of setting the context size in environment variables.
SOURCE: https://github.com/stackblitz-labs/bolt.diy/blob/main/docs/docs/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-20_snippet_8

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
DEFAULT_NUM_CTX=24576 # Uses 32GB VRAM
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Setting DEFAULT_NUM_CTX Environment Variable Example
DESCRIPTION: Example of setting the DEFAULT_NUM_CTX environment variable with a specific value for 32GB VRAM usage.
SOURCE: https://github.com/stackblitz-labs/bolt.diy/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-20_snippet_17

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
DEFAULT_NUM_CTX=24576 # Uses 32GB VRAM
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Starting the Development Server
DESCRIPTION: Command to start the Remix Vite development server for bolt.diy.
SOURCE: https://github.com/stackblitz-labs/bolt.diy/blob/main/docs/docs/index.md#2025-04-20_snippet_5

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
pnpm run dev
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Running Development Server with PNPM
DESCRIPTION: Command to start the development server using PNPM.
SOURCE: https://github.com/stackblitz-labs/bolt.diy/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-20_snippet_5

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
pnpm run dev
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Development Server Launch Command
DESCRIPTION: Command to start the development server using pnpm.
SOURCE: https://github.com/stackblitz-labs/bolt.diy/blob/main/docs/docs/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-20_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
pnpm run dev
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Building Docker Image for bolt.diy
DESCRIPTION: Commands to build the Docker image for bolt.diy using npm scripts or direct Docker commands.
SOURCE: https://github.com/stackblitz-labs/bolt.diy/blob/main/docs/docs/index.md#2025-04-20_snippet_6

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
npm run dockerbuild
```

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
docker build . --target bolt-ai-development
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Docker Development Environment Commands
DESCRIPTION: Commands for building and running Docker containers in development mode.
SOURCE: https://github.com/stackblitz-labs/bolt.diy/blob/main/docs/docs/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-20_snippet_5

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
npm run dockerbuild
docker build . --target bolt-ai-development
docker compose --profile development up
docker run -p 5173:5173 --env-file .env.local bolt-ai:development
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Building Docker Development Environment Directly
DESCRIPTION: Direct Docker build command for creating the development environment container.
SOURCE: https://github.com/stackblitz-labs/bolt.diy/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-20_snippet_9

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
docker build . --target bolt-ai-development
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Building Docker Development Environment with npm
DESCRIPTION: Command to build the Docker development environment using npm helper script.
SOURCE: https://github.com/stackblitz-labs/bolt.diy/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-20_snippet_8

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
npm run dockerbuild
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Running bolt.diy Docker Container
DESCRIPTION: Docker Compose command to run the bolt.diy container with the development profile.
SOURCE: https://github.com/stackblitz-labs/bolt.diy/blob/main/docs/docs/index.md#2025-04-20_snippet_7

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
docker compose --profile development up
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Using Docker Compose for Development Environment
DESCRIPTION: Docker Compose command to start the development environment using profiles.
SOURCE: https://github.com/stackblitz-labs/bolt.diy/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-20_snippet_10

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
docker compose --profile development up
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Running the Development Docker Container
DESCRIPTION: Command to run the development Docker container with port mapping and environment file.
SOURCE: https://github.com/stackblitz-labs/bolt.diy/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-20_snippet_11

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
docker run -p 5173:5173 --env-file .env.local bolt-ai:development
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Docker Production Environment Commands
DESCRIPTION: Commands for building and running Docker containers in production mode.
SOURCE: https://github.com/stackblitz-labs/bolt.diy/blob/main/docs/docs/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-20_snippet_6

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
npm run dockerbuild:prod
docker build . --target bolt-ai-production
docker compose --profile production up
docker run -p 5173:5173 --env-file .env.local bolt-ai:production
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Building Docker Production Environment with npm
DESCRIPTION: Command to build the Docker production environment using npm helper script.
SOURCE: https://github.com/stackblitz-labs/bolt.diy/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-20_snippet_12

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
npm run dockerbuild:prod
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Building Docker Production Environment Directly
DESCRIPTION: Direct Docker build command for creating the production environment container.
SOURCE: https://github.com/stackblitz-labs/bolt.diy/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-20_snippet_13

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
docker build . --target bolt-ai-production
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Updating Local bolt.diy Version
DESCRIPTION: Git and pnpm commands to update the local version of bolt.diy to the latest changes.
SOURCE: https://github.com/stackblitz-labs/bolt.diy/blob/main/docs/docs/index.md#2025-04-20_snippet_8

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
git pull origin main
```

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
pnpm install
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Rebuilding and Starting Updated Application
DESCRIPTION: Commands to rebuild and start the updated bolt.diy application, with options for Docker and non-Docker setups.
SOURCE: https://github.com/stackblitz-labs/bolt.diy/blob/main/docs/docs/index.md#2025-04-20_snippet_9

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
docker compose --profile development up --build
```

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
pnpm run dev
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Using Docker Compose for Production Environment
DESCRIPTION: Docker Compose command to start the production environment using profiles.
SOURCE: https://github.com/stackblitz-labs/bolt.diy/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-20_snippet_14

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
docker compose --profile production up
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Running the Production Docker Container
DESCRIPTION: Command to run the production Docker container with port mapping and environment file.
SOURCE: https://github.com/stackblitz-labs/bolt.diy/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-20_snippet_15

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
docker run -p 5173:5173 --env-file .env.local bolt-ai:production
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Running Test Suite with PNPM
DESCRIPTION: Command to execute the project's test suite using PNPM.
SOURCE: https://github.com/stackblitz-labs/bolt.diy/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-20_snippet_6

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
pnpm test
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Test Suite Execution Command
DESCRIPTION: Command to run the project's test suite using pnpm.
SOURCE: https://github.com/stackblitz-labs/bolt.diy/blob/main/docs/docs/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-20_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
pnpm test
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Deploying to Cloudflare Pages
DESCRIPTION: Command to deploy the application to Cloudflare Pages using PNPM.
SOURCE: https://github.com/stackblitz-labs/bolt.diy/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-20_snippet_7

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
pnpm run deploy
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Cloudflare Pages Deployment Command
DESCRIPTION: Command to deploy the application to Cloudflare Pages.
SOURCE: https://github.com/stackblitz-labs/bolt.diy/blob/main/docs/docs/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-20_snippet_4

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
pnpm run deploy
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Coolify Deployment Command
DESCRIPTION: Docker Compose command for deploying via Coolify platform.
SOURCE: https://github.com/stackblitz-labs/bolt.diy/blob/main/docs/docs/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-20_snippet_7

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
docker compose --profile production up
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Coolify Deployment Start Command
DESCRIPTION: Start command for deploying the application using Coolify with Docker Compose.
SOURCE: https://github.com/stackblitz-labs/bolt.diy/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-20_snippet_16

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
docker compose --profile production up
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Checking Node.js Path on Mac/Linux
DESCRIPTION: Command to verify if Node.js is in the system PATH on Mac or Linux systems.
SOURCE: https://github.com/stackblitz-labs/bolt.diy/blob/main/docs/docs/index.md#2025-04-20_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
echo $PATH
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Showing Hidden Files on Mac
DESCRIPTION: Terminal command to show hidden files in Finder on macOS.
SOURCE: https://github.com/stackblitz-labs/bolt.diy/blob/main/docs/docs/index.md#2025-04-20_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
defaults write com.apple.finder AppleShowAllFiles YES
```
